Teachers' Words Few and Well Chosen-- Teachers, meet with your classes. Pray with them, and teach them how to pray. Let the heart be softened, 
                                                                           257
and the petitions short and simple, but earnest. Let your words be few and well chosen; and let them learn from your lips and your example that the truth of God must be rooted in their hearts or they cannot stand the test of temptation. We want to see whole classes of young people being converted to God, and growing up useful members of the church.--CSW 125.
